entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 3:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SSW 25 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow or rain beginning this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain at times heavy late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Local snowfall amount 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
